title: Large-Scale: ChatGPT-Integrated Chemistry Education Design Project for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary chemistry education knowledge, understanding of basic teaching methodologies, experience with ChatGPT (optional)
context.additional_context: Learners develop chemistry education design competencies through iterative interactions with ChatGPT and produce instructional materials reflecting peer feedback in a PBL environment.

learning_goals: Using ChatGPT, learners can generate at least three types of scientifically and pedagogically relevant questions for designing elementary chemistry education activities.
By analyzing ChatGPT conversation logs, learners can propose at least one improvement plan for instructional design that reflects learners' prior knowledge.

Based on mixed research methodologies (structured activity design), learners critically evaluate ChatGPT-generated content and classify its applicability in real classrooms into three levels (high, medium, low).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
